ai-tha-ap360:1.2_0: the world, for the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap360:2.3_0: being attached to beds and benches,
ai-tha-ap360:2.4_0: I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-tha-ap360:3.2_0: I was rugged me by saying
ai-tha-ap360:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap360:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap360:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable senior venerable Dīghāvu.
ai-tha-ap360:6.1_0: on beds and benches, the seniors.
